mapper.insert: insert into ADMIN (AD_NO , AD_ID , AD_PW , AD_NAME , AD_DATE , AD_ACTIVE , ROL_NO) values (CONCAT("AD", IFNULL((SELECT MAX(CAST(replace(AD_NO, "AD", "") AS unsigned))+1 FROM ADMIN A), 1)) , #{AD_ID} , #{AD_PW} , #{AD_NAME} , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , 'RO2' , '0')
mapper.select: select CAST(REPLACE(a.AD_NO, "AD", "") AS UNSIGNED) "AD_NO" , a.AD_ID , r.ROL_NAME , a.AD_ACTIVE from ADMIN a join ROLE r on a.ROL_NO = r.ROL_NO ORDER BY AD_NO
select AD_ID from ADMIN where AD_ID = #{AD_ID}
select CODE , ACTIVE , SEQ , CASE CO_DETAIL WHEN '0' THEN '글' WHEN '1' THEN '글+사진' WHEN '2' THEN '글+사진+날짜' ELSE '없음' END AS "CO_DETAIL" from CODE where CO_TYPE = 'MM' ORDER BY SEQ
select SEQ , CODE , ACTIVE from CODE where CO_TYPE = 'CA' ORDER BY SEQ
select CO_TYPE , CO_NO , CODE , CO_DETAIL , SEQ from CODE where CO_TYPE = 'FO' and ACTIVE = '1'
select MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NICK , MEM_NAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_DATE from MEMBERS ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC
select PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRO_WR , date_format(str_to_date(PRO_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') AS PRO_DATE from PRODUCT where PRO_TC = 'MM1' ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC

select PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRO_WR , date_format(str_to_date(PRO_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') AS PRO_DATE from PRODUCT where 1 = 1
AND PRO_TC = 'MM1'
AND PRO_TC = 'MM2'
AND PRO_TC = 'MM3'
AND PRO_TC = 'MM4'
ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC
